docs.lead_paragraph: THE mid-year report of The Hundred Neediest Cases Fund is presented on these pages today. The 100 simple stories that follow tell what six months of aid have meant to the 100 cases published by THE NEW YORK TIMES in its twenty-third annual appeal at last Christmas time.

headline.main: THE NEEDIEST NO LONGER! SIX MONTHS OF PROGRESS; The Fund Given Last Christmas by Readers of The New York Times Is Rebuilding the Lives of Many Persons Who Were in Want
